name: Chestnut Grove (itch)
description:
WHAT CAN YOU DO, WHEN YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO ACT? BASED ON TRUE EVENTS

How do you go about your life when being confined to self isolation becomes the new normal? CHESTNUT GROVE is based on my personal experience being quarantined at home and features 100% real documents and notices.

EXPERIENCE CONFINEMENT

When your daily life is confined to a small area, you start to take a closer look at the familiar. See how the crisis impacts your usual environment.

CHESTNUT GROVE features
  • a short first person experience portraying life during COVID-19 pandemic.
  • a focus on atmosphere and mood.
  • light puzzles and environmental interactions.
MORE INFO
